Description: Mould-made pottery lamp with a plain discus. In the top of the nozzle is a large air-hole; the tip of the nozzle is missing. At the rear is a ring handle, below a lost handle-ornament. Within the base-ring is the name FAVSTI in relief. Covered with an orange-brown slip.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q1917.bis)
